means: 有关存在的，存在主义的，存在判断的

sentence.Network_en: Existential questions requir-ing religious answers still persist.
sentence.Network_cn: 需要通过宗教来解释的关乎人类存在的问题仍然存留。

sentence.Network_en: "What if there's nothing left at all?" he cries, lost in some intense existential angst.
sentence.Network_cn: “要是什么都不会留下呢？”他叫喊道，陷入了对自身存在的深度焦虑。

sentence.Network_en: Existential questions requiring religious answers still persist.
sentence.Network_cn: 需要通过宗教来解释的关乎人类存在的问题仍然存留。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...第 4期为科学知识具有不同的层次: 第一个层次是存在的( existential), 也就是对数据和事实的搜集与整理; 第二个层次是相关性的.
existent 存在的existential 有关存在的existentialist 存在主义者
exigent 需要立即采取行动的existential 存在主义的exodus 大批离去
所以，信仰是实存的 (existential) 也有其互相关连或群体性的一面。无疑我们在享受与神的关系中进深及成长、但褔音所带给我们的平 …

list.abs: existential crisis 存在危机existential education 存在主义教育existential group 存在团体
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... exercise 练习 existential quantifier 存在量词 expand 展开.
existential psychotherapy 存在主义心理治疗existential specification 存在规范existential therapy 存在疗法

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from late Latin existentialis, from existentia (see existence)

entry.tran: 关于人类存在的;基于存在（或经验）的
entry.def: Existential means relating to human existence and experience.

example.ex: Existential questions requiring religious answers still persist.
example.tran: 需要通过宗教来解释的关乎人类存在的问题仍然存留。

entry.def: You use existential to describe fear, anxiety, and other feelings that are caused by thinking about human existence and death.

example.ex: 'What if there's nothing left at all?' he cries, lost in some intense existential angst.
example.tran: “要是什么都不会留下呢？”他叫喊道，陷入了对自身存在的深度焦虑。

means.word_mean: 1. derived from experience or the experience of existence;

sentences.sentence: "the rich experiential content of the teachings of the older philosophers"- Benjamin Farrington
"formal logicians are not concerned with existential matters"- John Dewey

means.word_mean: 2. of or as conceived by existentialism;
3. relating to or dealing with existence (especially with human existence)

auth_sentence.content: It's also something of an existential statement.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's also something of an existential statement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's also something of an existential statement.

auth_sentence.content: The effect was a state of existential madness.
auth_sentence.res_content: The effect was a state of existential madness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The effect was a state of existential madness.

Sentence.sentence: They found it hard to know what to want, creating a kind of existential bafflement.
